# Talkington Township, Sangamon County, Illinois

|population_est = 187
|blank_name = FIPS code
|blank_info = 17-167-74340
}}
Talkington Township is a township in Sangamon County, Illinois. As of the 2010 census, its population was 189 and it contained 86 housing units.
Geography
According to the 2010 census, the township has a total area of , all land.
